31#include "mech_locl.h"
32
33/**
34 * Release a credentials
35 *
36 * Its ok to release the GSS_C_NO_CREDENTIAL/NULL credential, it will
37 * return a GSS_S_COMPLETE error code. On return cred_handle is set ot
38 * GSS_C_NO_CREDENTIAL.
39 *
40 * Example:
41 *
42 * @code
43 * gss_cred_id_t cred = GSS_C_NO_CREDENTIAL;
44 * major = gss_release_cred(&minor, &cred);
45 * @endcode
46 *
47 * @param minor_status minor status return code, mech specific
48 * @param cred_handle a pointer to the credential too release
49 *
50 * @return an gssapi error code
51 *
52 * @ingroup gssapi
53 */
54
55GSSAPI_LIB_FUNCTION OM_uint32 GSSAPI_LIB_CALL
56gss_release_cred(OM_uint32 *minor_status, gss_cred_id_t *cred_handle)
57{
58 struct _gss_cred *cred = (struct _gss_cred *) *cred_handle;
59 struct _gss_mechanism_cred *mc;
60
61 if (*cred_handle == GSS_C_NO_CREDENTIAL)
62 return (GSS_S_COMPLETE);
63
64 while (HEIM_SLIST_FIRST(&cred->gc_mc)) {
65 mc = HEIM_SLIST_FIRST(&cred->gc_mc);
66 HEIM_SLIST_REMOVE_HEAD(&cred->gc_mc, gmc_link);
67 mc->gmc_mech->gm_release_cred(minor_status, &mc->gmc_cred);
68 free(mc);
69 }
70 free(cred);
71
72 *minor_status = 0;
73 *cred_handle = GSS_C_NO_CREDENTIAL;
74 return (GSS_S_COMPLETE);
75}
76
